extension.name: ITP Transifex Packages
extension.author: Todor Iliev
extension.description:
ITPTransifex is an extension that provides capability to manage language packages, which are published on Transifex.

Read documentation that will help you to setup the extensions.

Invest in the extension and help for its improvement. You can sponsor the extension via SMS, PayPal or Bitcoin.

Subscribe for the newsletter to receive gifts, discount codes, information about updates and information about new ITPrism extensions.

Please, vote for the extension on Joomla! Extensions Directory
